casebody.data:
Wednesday, September 12, 2001

MOTION DOCKET

01-1093. State ex rel. Yellow Freight Sys., Inc. v. Indus. Comm.

Franklin App. No. OOAP-920. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion to stay proceedings and briefing schedule pending settlement in this case pursuant to S.CtPrac.R. XIV(6)(C),

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion be, and hereby is, granted, and proceedings and briefing schedule are stayed, effective September 11, 2001.
